item.title: Project v6 summoning
item.dc:creator: @wazup wazup
item.description:
@wazup wrote:

kk… i dnt get u soz [code]sendQuest(“Iron Dragon (lvl 225)”, 664); // npc = 1591
if(summonLevel >= 235)
sendQuest("@gre@Steel Dragon (lvl 235)", 8971); // npc = 1592
else
sendQuest(“Steel Dragon (lvl 235)”, 8971); // npc = 1592
if(summonLevel >= 250 && playerRights >= 2)
sendQuest("@gre@Flambeed", 4306); // npc = 3494
else
sendQuest(“Flambeed”, 4306); // npc = 3494

sendQuest("@dbl@==================", 7454);
}[/code] wot shuld tht look like to get flambeed spawn insted of brozne drage… not both … brb

Read full topic

change the 1st one to bronze dragon npc code is 1590.

item.title: Project v6 summoning

item.description:
@wazup wrote:

it lok like [code]sendQuest(“Iron Dragon (lvl 225)”, 664); // npc = 1591
if(summonLevel >= 235)
sendQuest("@gre@Steel Dragon (lvl 235)", 8971); // npc = 1592
else
sendQuest(“Steel Dragon (lvl 235)”, 8971); // npc = 1592
if(summonLevel >= 250 && playerRights >= 2)
sendQuest("@gre@Flambeed", 4306); // npc = 3494
else
sendQuest(“Flambeed”, 4306); // npc = 3494

sendQuest("@dbl@==================", 7454);
}
[/code] hope da change workd:)[br][size=1]Posted on: January 26, 2007, 01:20:00 PM[/size][hr]still bronze dragon
